radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal except for sinus tachycardia (108 bpm).
Low levels of TSH (0.13 plU/ml; range=0.35-5.50) and free T4 (0.7 ng/dl; range=0.9-1.8) with a normal total T3 level (1.32 ng/ml; range=0.60-1.81).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up thyroid function testing after 90 days showed normal results (TSH level, 0.72 plU/ml; total T3 level, 1.16 ng/ml; free T4 level, 1.0 ng/dl).

radiographic_examinations.findings: Blood pressure was measured at 200/120 mm Hg.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: After administration of missed medications, blood pressure decreased to 193/94 mm Hg.
